entry.title: Use a Package pricing to your charges
entry.summary: It's now possible to apply a Package pricing model to a charge.
entry.content:
It's now possible to apply a Package pricing model to a charge. To do so, go to one of your Plans, import a new charge and select the Package pricing model.

Ths pricing model is very useful if you want to apply a price to a range of units. The price will be applied to the whole range, regardless the number of units consumed.
